qas.question: In what season does New Delhi's air pollution worsen?
What method was introduced in December 2015 to reduce New Delhi's air pollution?
New Delhi's alternate-day travel scheme allowed trucks to enter the city after what hour?
How long is the initial trial period for New Delhi's driving restriction scheme?
On what day of the week will travel remain unrestricted by New Delhi's alternate day driving scheme?

context: In an attempt to curb air pollution in New Delhi, which gets worst during the <a0_0>winter<a0_0/>, a temporary <a1_0>alternate-day travel<a1_0/> scheme for cars using the odd- and even-numbered license plates system was announced by Delhi government in December 2015. In addition, trucks will be allowed to enter India's capital only after <a2_0>11 p.m<a2_0/>., two hours later than the existing restriction. The driving restriction scheme is planned to be implemented as a trial from January 1, 2016 for an initial period of <a3_0>15 days<a3_0/>. The restriction will be in force between 8 a.m. and 8 p.m., and traffic will not be restricted on <a4_0>Sundays<a4_0/>. Public transportation service will be increased during the restriction period.
